author: hwright
msg: Write values to the working_node table if an item is anything but
(write_entry): If the entry isn't scheduled normal, we've got some working
copy state to track.  Put a row in the working_node table.

author: markphip
msg: JavaHL: Modify the assertExpectedSuggestion test to actually verify
the suggestions returned from the suggestMergeSources API.  This
reveals a regression in the API since 1.5.
(assertExpectedSuggestion): Verify the suggestion is the correct path.
(testCopy, testMove): Specify the correct expected path when calling

author: cmpilato
msg: On the http-protocol-v2 branch: Teach mod_dav_svn to return the
repository root URL, and to provide absolute URIs for the new stubs.
Oh.  And make the 'update-style' reports hit the "me resource" URI
(get_option): Toss an SVN-Repos-Root header into the OPTIONS response, too.
Also, transmit absolute URIs for the HTTP v2 stubs.
(parse_me_resource_uri): Expect an empty-string path, not a NULL one.
(parse_uri): Teach this code that it's okay to hand off to the
special parsers URIs that have no extra components or repos paths
*when those specials are defined to look exactly that way*.
(svn_ra_serf__discover_root): Allow rel_path calculation in the HTTP
v2 case, too, removing one TODO comment.  But leave a different
svn_ra_serf__discover_root(), which enables HTTP v2 support.
SVN-Repos-Root header, and store its value in the session baton as
